RunSynchronousCommand.Path: cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\disable-defender.cmd" echo FOR ^%^%s IN (Sense WdBoot WdFilter WdNisDrv WdNisSvc WinDefend) DO reg.exe ADD HKLM\mount\ControlSet001\Services\^%^%s /v Start /t REG_DWORD /d 4 /f"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\disable-defender.cmd" echo IF ^%errorlevel^% GTR 0 GOTO load"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\disable-defender.cmd" echo FOR ^%^%s IN (Sense WdBoot WdFilter WdNisDrv WdNisSvc WinDefend) DO reg.exe ADD HKLM\mount\ControlSet001\Services\^%^%s /v Start /t REG_DWORD /d 4 /f"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\disable-defender.cmd" echo IF ^%errorlevel^% GTR 0 GOTO load"

Extensions.File: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\Sense "Start" = REG_DWORD 4 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\WdBoot "Start" = REG_DWORD 4 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\WdFilter "Start" = REG_DWORD 4 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\WdNisDrv "Start" = REG_DWORD 4 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\WdNisSvc "Start" = REG_DWORD 4 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\WinDefend "Start" = REG_DWORD 4

REM Esse script executa um cmg/bat antes de uma conta de usuario ser criada
REM desligando hibernacao powercfg.exe /HIBERNATE OFF

REM esse script roda como usuario padrao e afeta ate mesmo o usuario administrador reg.exe add "HKU\DefaultUser\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\WindowsCopilot" /v "TurnOffWindowsCopilot" /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /f

# esse script roda como usuario padrao e afeta ate mesmo o usuario administrador Set-ItemProperty - LiteralPath "Registry::HKU\DefaultUser\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\WindowsCopilot" -Name "TurnOffWindowsCopilot" -Type "DWord" -Value 1;
